channel.title: Armadyl - Project Decimate Remake!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1O2v0Pb.png[/img]
Website: [url=http://armadyl.org]Home[/url]
Play Now: [url=http://armadyl.org/webclient.php]Play Now[/url]
Download: [url=http://armadyl.org/Armadyl.jar]Download[/url]
[size=14pt][b]Welcome to Armadyl, this is a brand new server. The server is a remake of the popular Project Decimate. The owners are myself(Mikey) & Root.[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SQ6XhRv.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iSyYxLi.png[/img]
- PVP COMBAT - â€¢ Perfect clipped following. â€¢ Clipped projectiles for both ranged and magic. â€¢ Perfect max hit, and attack/defense formulas. â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs players. â€¢ Working curse prayers, and regular prayers. â€¢ PvP point shops that requires kills to unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks a new item in the shop. â€¢ Uncheatable PvP point system. â€¢ Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wild. â€¢ Perfect animations, hit delays, weapon speeds. â€¢ Correct item effects, spirit sheilds, DFS, barrows, slayer helm etc. â€¢ Fully working curses with correct effects. â€¢ Instant switching. â€¢ Vengeance. â€¢ Ring of recoil.
- PVM COMBAT - â€¢ Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs. â€¢ Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs. â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs. â€¢ Npcs don't walk on top of one another. â€¢ Can't diagnal fight or stand on Npc. â€¢ Multi barrage.
- BOSSES & MONSTERS - â€¢ King Black dragon â€¢ Dagannoth kings â€¢ Chaos elemental â€¢ Kalphite queen â€¢ Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon â€¢ Nex â€¢ Nomad â€¢ Barrelchest â€¢ Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation â€¢ Corperal beast â€¢ Dreadnaut â€¢ Bork â€¢ Primal warriors â€¢ Tormented demons â€¢ Revenants â€¢ Glacors â€¢ Unholy cursebearer â€¢ Strykewyrms â€¢ Frost dragons â€¢ Chaos tunnels â€¢ Mithril dragons â€¢ Slayer dungeon â€¢ Ranged & Mage training dungeon.
- MINIGAMES - â€¢ Fight caves â€¢ Fight pits â€¢ Warriors guild â€¢ Duel arena â€¢ Pest control â€¢ Barrows â€¢ Fun pk â€¢ Barbarian Defence â€¢ Spirit warriors â€¢ Champions challenge â€¢ Demon slayer â€¢ Recipe for Disaster â€¢ Camelot drop party daily server event
- SKILLING - â€¢ Skillcapes, and proper emotes.
â€¢ Max cape available when all stats are maxed at 99.
â€¢ Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.
â€¢ Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, and super prayer potions.
â€¢ Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
â€¢ Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
â€¢ Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.
â€¢ Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop.
â€¢ Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.
â€¢ Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
â€¢ Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.
â€¢ Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.
â€¢ Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.
â€¢ Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.
â€¢ Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.
The server is VPS Hosted and is online 24/7. [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/WnU8Wb5.png[/img][/center] Here are some pictures for all you guys to judge and see:
The portal room as shown below: [img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/svme7n.jpg[/img]
The skilling portals & shops. [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1ztdl2.png[/img]
The heavy armour shop shown below: [img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/5d5pwi.jpg[/img]
Saying hello to me: [img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/5n9gyc.jpg[/img]
Showing the mining/smithing area: [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/11kfa82.jpg[/img]
Some of the portals at home. [img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/foipht.jpg[/img]
The basic shops. [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/ofd43m.jpg[/img]
Some of the other portals. [img]http://oi60.tinypic.com/m534n.jpg[/img]
The thieving area. [img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/wmcn0g.jpg[/img]
Come join us today! [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/33jtmy1.jpg[/img]
PvP Store. [img]http://i.imgur.com/ASxPa8U.png[/img]
Pk Reward System. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Yjwi2On.png[/img]
Slayer Rewards. [img]http://i.imgur.com/la1T0qF.png[/img]
Thanks for reading guys, hope to see you in-game any questions just ask me(mikey) or my Co-Owner Root. [/center]

item.title: Armadyl - Project Decimate Remake!
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

[center]

Website:
Home

Play Now:
Play Now

Download:
Download

[size=14pt]Welcome to Armadyl, this is a brand new server. The server is a remake of the popular Project Decimate.
The owners are myself(Mikey) & Root.[/size]

  • PVP COMBAT -
    â€¢ Perfect clipped following.
    â€¢ Clipped projectiles for both ranged and magic.
    â€¢ Perfect max hit, and attack/defense formulas.
    â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs players.
    â€¢ Working curse prayers, and regular prayers.
    â€¢ PvP point shops that requires kills to unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks a new item in the shop.
    â€¢ Uncheatable PvP point system.
    â€¢ Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wild.
    â€¢ Perfect animations, hit delays, weapon speeds.
    â€¢ Correct item effects, spirit sheilds, DFS, barrows, slayer helm etc.
    â€¢ Fully working curses with correct effects.
    â€¢ Instant switching.
    â€¢ Vengeance.
    â€¢ Ring of recoil.

  • PVM COMBAT -
    â€¢ Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs.
    â€¢ Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs.
    â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs.
    â€¢ Npcs don’t walk on top of one another.
    â€¢ Can’t diagnal fight or stand on Npc.
    â€¢ Multi barrage.

  • BOSSES & MONSTERS -
    â€¢ King Black dragon
    â€¢ Dagannoth kings
    â€¢ Chaos elemental
    â€¢ Kalphite queen
    â€¢ Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon
    â€¢ Nex
    â€¢ Nomad
    â€¢ Barrelchest
    â€¢ Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation
    â€¢ Corperal beast
    â€¢ Dreadnaut
    â€¢ Bork
    â€¢ Primal warriors
    â€¢ Tormented demons
    â€¢ Revenants
    â€¢ Glacors
    â€¢ Unholy cursebearer
    â€¢ Strykewyrms
    â€¢ Frost dragons
    â€¢ Chaos tunnels
    â€¢ Mithril dragons
    â€¢ Slayer dungeon
    â€¢ Ranged & Mage training dungeon.

  • MINIGAMES -
    â€¢ Fight caves
    â€¢ Fight pits
    â€¢ Warriors guild
    â€¢ Duel arena
    â€¢ Pest control
    â€¢ Barrows
    â€¢ Fun pk
    â€¢ Barbarian Defence
    â€¢ Spirit warriors
    â€¢ Champions challenge
    â€¢ Demon slayer
    â€¢ Recipe for Disaster
    â€¢ Camelot drop party daily server event

  • SKILLING -
    â€¢ Skillcapes, and proper emotes.

â€¢ Max cape available when all stats are maxed at 99.

â€¢ Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.

â€¢ Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, and super prayer potions.

â€¢ Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.

â€¢ Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.

â€¢ Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.

â€¢ Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop.

â€¢ Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.

â€¢ Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.

â€¢ Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.

â€¢ Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.

â€¢ Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.

â€¢ Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.

â€¢ Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.

The server is VPS Hosted and is online 24/7.
[center][/center]
Here are some pictures for all you guys to judge and see:

Thanks for reading guys, hope to see you in-game any questions just ask me(mikey) or my Co-Owner Root.
